content.question: Scientists are interested in determining if selenium, from a nearby mine, magnifies in the tissues of fish living in a lake. Which of the following best describes a testable hypothesis for the study?

choices.label: Tissue from fish in the lake will have a higher level of selenium than tissue from fish in a nearby lake.
Selenium will be at a higher concentration in fish tissue than in the tissue of fish prey.
Fish will have a higher concentration of selenium than mercury in their tissues.
Selenium will be at a higher concentration in acid mine drainage than in fish tissues.

content.answer: Selenium will be at a higher concentration in fish tissue than in the tissue of fish prey.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify a testable hypothesis or scientific question for an investigation.
